descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00]!!!WARNING!!!
!!!NOT COMPATIBLE WITH HEARTHFIRE DLC!!!
!!!NAVMESHES ARE NOT COMPLETELY GENERATED!!!BETTER NOT USE COMPANIONS IN THIS MOD INTERIORS!!![/color]

[color=#ffff00]Krirg Manor [/color]v2.1 Eng/Rus

[color=#ffff00]Credits[/color]:
Ronnie Magnum - meshes, textures, locations, soundtrack, texts
Dmitri Ioannovich, Sannifer - texts
Imperator3, Letonoots - mesh conversion
9RedMen - screenshots, quality control

This mod adds new player home - Krirg manor - near Riverwood and Helgen. Once upon a time there lived a collector who had obtained a bunch of rare items. But after his sudden disappearence his manor is now empty.
[color=#ffff00]
!!!USE ONLY ONE ESP-FILE!!!
!!!NOT COMPATIBLE WITH HEARTHFIRE DLC!!![/color]

***

[color=#ffff00]
